page.title: 11Health
page.content: The local is called the Stanley Sailors hospital. It was given this name because part of the initial cost was borne by the Stanley family. Today the hospital performs a duel purpose,firstly as a small community hospital dealing with minor emergencies.Secondly it has a small geriatric /convalescence ward used mainly by local doctors. The ambulance station is situated in the same area.The ambulances are able to respond to local emergencies and also transfer seriously ill patients to the area hospital.
